unicornDescription: The late great unicorn, whose life ended far too soon. He also has a fantastic collection of mixtapes.
Can only be summoned during emergencies. Is technically ethereal. Is way too cool for you. Has two horns and a rainbow mane.

unicornName: Matilda the Horse with a Horn
unicornDescription: Experts are still unsure if she is a unicorn a horse with a horn. More research needed.
Favorite quote: Open your eyes and see, your eyes are open. Magical robot unicorn. Can transform into a unicorn bear
the secret of Joss has been revealed :O
